abstract: Kyle Busch races to his first Xfinity Series win at Atlanta Motor Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch claimed his first Xfinity Series victory at Atlanta Motor Speedway by holding off Kyle Larson.

headline.print_headline: Kyle Busch Holds On to Win in Georgia
headline.main: Kyle Busch Holds On for a First Series Victory
